ygData.subject: Re: Weapon Damage [was: L50 (Spoilers)]
ygData.msgSnippet: I m 17th level, so those are out of my league. Anyone else hear that the new patch is going to make it so that if the monster cons green to you, you can no
ygData.messageBody:
I'm 17th level, so those are out of my league.

Anyone else hear that the new patch is going to make it so that if the
monster cons green to you, you can no longer loot lore items, (They just
won't appear).

Hopefully now I can go get some decent items.

Wenaddar


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) [SMTP:Michael.Garramone@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 4:56 PM
> To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Weapon Damage [was: L50 (Spoilers)]
>
> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> ok here is my experience on what gives bonus to dmg:
>
> Level 20+
> Strength 100+
> Increased skill points in that weapon type
>
> Last night i hit for 50 with my crystalline blade (dmg 11), i was quite
> shocked, but that is my best hit to date. this is with 113STR plus level
> 49
> shaman strength buff plus level 50 song, which put me close to 200 or so.
> once you hit 20 you may not notice much, but the higher your level and the
> higher your skill, the more you will hit for. i can easily hit for 4* dmg
> or more with 200 skill in 1h slashing and 1h blunt. plus i think your
> primary hand will hit harder than your secondary.
>
> so it takes time but you will start to notice as you get higher above
> level
> 20. and even though your song gives you 102 str, i would try to get some
> strength enhancing items if you have the money (easiest 6 STR you can get
> are 2 golden amber earrings, which i think go for 80 to 100pp for the
> pair).
> i don't know your level so i don't know when you will be able to afford
> such
> items. some items i have that enhance strength are:
>
> Golden Amber Earrings +3STR each (~100pp pair)
> Silver Ruby Veil +4STR +4WIS (~200pp)
> Jagged Bands 5AC +3STR each (~150pp each)
> Purity Belt +2STR +2STA (~15pp)
>
> i think some lower level items are the spiked collar +3STR, flesh bands
> +2STR each, and the purity belt.
>
> Shada Silverleaf, Level 50 Bard, Mithaniel Marr
> Erisi, Level 7 Paladin, Mithaniel Marr
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Schafer, Timothy L 1425 [mailto:Timothy.Schafer@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 1:14 PM
> > To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] L50 (Spoilers)
> >
> >
> > From: "Schafer, Timothy L 1425" <Timothy.Schafer@...>
> >
> > Since you are a bard I hope you can answer this question for
> > me. What level
> > did you see an improvement in damage, (when did you start
> > doing more than
> > (2xdmg)+1. I have heard so many different stories I don't know who to
> > believe. I have a strength of 90 base, and 102 with songs. Does the
> > strength effect the damage, or is based on skill points, or what.
> >
> > I would appreciate any response you could offer.
> >
> > Thanks,
> >
> > Wenaddar
> >
>
